full_text: The Manchin-Schumer climate, tax and healthcare bill would, for the first time, give the federal government the authority to negotiate how much it pays for some prescription drugs  https://t.co/0EYaOMNQsP

localize.full_text: Manchin-Schumerの気候・税・医療法案は、初めて連邦政府に一部の処方薬に支払う金額を交渉する権限を与える。https://t.co/0EYaOMNQsP
